name: Aarav Mehta
bio: Aarav is a versatile singer with 7+ years of experience performing live at concerts and weddings.

name: Diya Kapoor
bio: Trained in classical and contemporary styles, Diya brings grace and energy to every stage she performs on.

name: DJ Raghav
bio: Raghav has headlined multiple college festivals and private events with his high-energy EDM mixes.

name: Kavya Joshi
bio: Kavya is a TEDx speaker known for her powerful talks on mental health and career growth.

name: Rahul Sharma
bio: Classically trained vocalist specializing in bhajans and semi-classical music for spiritual gatherings.

name: Meera Desai
bio: Meera is a celebrated folk dancer who specializes in Garba and has performed in over 100 regional events.

name: DJ Aryan
bio: Aryan spins infectious Bollywood remixes and is a go-to DJ for sangeet, parties, and wedding receptions.

name: Neha Bhatia
bio: Neha is a startup mentor and speaker who helps young entrepreneurs build MVPs and pitch with confidence.
